title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
Introducing the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, the ultimate keyboard for gamers and general use. With its hybrid mechanical switch, OLED smart display, and premium features, this keyboard offers an exceptional gaming experience.

The SteelSeries Apex 5 features a hybrid mechanical switch that combines the tactile click of a blue switch with the smoothness of a membrane. This unique switch type provides the perfect balance of responsiveness and comfort, making every keystroke precise and satisfying.

The OLED smart display is a standout feature of the Apex 5. It allows you to customize gifs, view game info, and even see discord messages, all directly on your keyboard. This display adds a new level of immersion and convenience to your gaming experience.

Compatibility is not an issue with the Apex 5. It is compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, ensuring that you can use it with any device or gaming console you prefer.

Crafted with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, the frame of the Apex 5 is built to last. It provides a solid and sturdy base for your gaming sessions, ensuring that your keyboard will withstand even the most intense gameplay.

The per-key RGB illumination adds a vibrant and customizable lighting effect to your keyboard. Each key can be individually lit with any color you desire, creating a stunning visual display that matches your gaming setup or personal style.

The Apex 5 comes with a premium magnetic wrist rest, offering full palm support and exceptional comfort during long gaming sessions. The magnetic design allows for easy attachment and detachment, making it convenient to use whenever and wherever you need it.

With dimensions of 900mm in width, 300mm in depth, and 4mm in height (35.43 inches x 11.81 inches x 0.16 inches), this keyboard provides ample space for comfortable and precise typing.

The Apex 5 is also water-resistant with an IP32 rating, ensuring that accidental spills or splashes won't cause damage to your keyboard. This durability feature allows you to game with peace of mind.

To connect the Apex 5 to your device, a USB port is required. Simply plug it in, and you're ready to go.

Whether you're a dedicated gamer or need a high-performance keyboard for general use, the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is the perfect choice. Upgrade your gaming setup with this exceptional keyboard and take your gaming experience to the next level.

Introducing the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, the ultimate keyboard for gamers and general users alike. With its powerful features and sleek design, this keyboard will enhance your gaming experience and productivity.

Key Features:
- Switch Type: Hybrid mechanical (tactile click of blue switch + smooth membrane) for a satisfying and comfortable typing experience.
- Display Type: OLED smart display for easy access to customizable gifs, game info, and discord messages.
- Compatible OS: Works seamlessly with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation.
- Frame Material: Made with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy for durability and a premium feel.
- RGB Illumination: Enjoy per-key RGB illumination for a vibrant and customizable lighting experience.
- Wrist Rest: Includes a premium magnetic wrist rest with full palm support and comfort.
- Dimensions: Measures 900mm in width, 300mm in depth, and 4mm in height (35.43 inches width, 11.81 inches depth, 0.16 inches height).
- Water Resistance: Built with IP32 water resistance to protect against accidental spills.
- USB Port Required: Easily connects to your devices with a USB port.

Whether you're a professional gamer or someone who spends hours on their computer, the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is the perfect choice. Upgrade your typing experience and take your gaming to the next level with this top-of-the-line keyboard.

Featuring an OLED smart display, this keyboard allows you to customize gifs, display game information, and view Discord messages, enhancing your gaming experience. The per-key RGB illumination adds a vibrant and customizable lighting effect to your keyboard.

With dimensions of 900mm (length) x 300mm (width) x 4mm (height), or 35.43 inches x 11.81 inches, this keyboard offers ample space for comfortable typing and gaming. It is compatible with various operating systems, including Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation.

The SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is also IP32 water-resistant, ensuring protection against accidental spills. Additionally, it requires a USB port for connectivity.

Experience the ultimate gaming and typing performance with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard. Suitable for both gaming enthusiasts and everyday users, this keyboard is a perfect addition to your setup.
